amendment.description: To provide additional funding for grants for innovative programs to address dental workforce needs of designated dental health professional shortage areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1616 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1616 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11297; text: CR S11297) To provide additional funding for grants for innovative programs to address dental workforce needs of designated dental health professional shortage areas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1616 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1616 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 1542.
